title: Home Buying Tips In A (Crazy) Hot Market
itunes:title: Home Buying Tips In A (Crazy) Hot Market
description:
Housing market is crazy hot right now as sales have continued to soar this 2022. More than 93 percent of homes purchased by corporations as of May 2021 were bought for under $300,000, and many of them were in predominantly Black neighborhoods. Tagged along with high demand is having fast-paced decision-making. In this episode, we run through some home buying tips to help you decide quickly yet efficiently in acquiring your dream house.

🎙️ Get full show notes here!
https://bit.ly/39RM3SX
